description: Make an incredible feast of pork ribs, chargrilled spiced Mexican corn on the cob and crisp salad. This flavour-packed meal is so easy to make.
name: Pork Ribs With Mexican Corn & Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.3kg Woolworths COOK pork ribs in a smokey bbq sauce
4 corn cobs, husks and silks discarded
0.25 bunch coriander, leaves picked, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fanforced. Heat pork according to packet instructions.

Meanwhile, heat a chargrill pan over high heat. Spray corn and lime with oil. Cook corn, turning occasionally, for 10 minutes or until charred and tender, adding lime halves to pan, cutsides down, in the last 2 minutes of cooking.
Prepare salad according to packet instructions.

Combine mayonnaise, chilli powder and lime zest in a small bowl. Season with pepper. Brush corn with mayonnaise mixture. Sprinkle with parmesan. Serve pork with corn, salad, lime halves and scattered with coriander.
